entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
